title: A Charity Closes After News About a Friend
summary: Sarah Ferguson's charity, called Sarah's Trust, is closing down. This happened a few days after new information came out about her friendship with Jeffrey Epstein, who was a bad person. The charity was started in 2020 to help people with hunger and poverty. A spokesman said they decided to close after talking about it for months. Last year, other charities stopped working with Sarah Ferguson because of her connection to Epstein. The new information includes emails and pictures, but being named does not mean she did anything wrong. The charity did not say exactly why it is closing.
